details.title: Ingredients
details.description: This recipe serves 4 and requires the following ingredients:
ingredients: 500g boneless chicken breast, cut into strips
method: In a bowl, whisk together soy sauce, hoisin sauce, chili garlic sauce, and black pepper.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Add chicken and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until lightly browned.
Add garlic and ginger, and stir-fry for another 30 seconds.
Add peppers and onion, and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until they start to soften.
Pour the sauce over the chicken and vegetables, and stir-fry for another minute or until everything is coated in the sauce.
Garnish with scallions and sesame seeds, and serve hot with rice.

author: Ken Hom
name: Baked Salmon with Lemon and Dill

details.title: Ingredients
details.description: This recipe serves 6 and requires the following ingredients: This mouth-watering chicken tikka masala recipe is easy to make and is sure to be a crowd-pleaser. Tender pieces of chicken are marinated in a spiced yogurt mixture, then grilled and simmered in a rich tomato-based sauce. Serve with steamed rice or naan bread for a delicious and satisfying meal.
method: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, honey, dill, salt, and pepper.
Place salmon fillets in a baking dish and pour the sauce over them, making sure to coat evenly.
Bake for 15-20 minutes, until salmon is cooked through and flakes easily with a fork.
Garnish with lemon wedges and serve hot.

details.title: Ingredients
details.description: This recipe serves 2 and requires the following ingredients: These fluffy pancakes are the perfect breakfast treat. They're easy to make and can be customized with your favorite toppings, such as fresh berries or whipped cream. Serve with a side of crispy bacon or sausage for a delicious start to your day.
method: In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, oyster sauce, cornstarch, water, and a pinch of salt.
Heat vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Add beef and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until browned.
Add garlic and ginger, and stir-fry for another 30 seconds.
Add broccoli and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until it starts to soften.
Pour the sauce over the beef and broccoli, and stir-fry for another minute or until everything is coated in the sauce.
Serve hot with rice.

details.title: Ingredients
details.description: This recipe serves 1 and requires the following ingredients: These flavorful tacos are loaded with grilled shrimp, fresh salsa, and a zesty lime crema. They're perfect for a casual dinner with friends, and can be customized with your favorite toppings, such as avocado or cilantro.
method: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a large bowl, toss together bell peppers, zucchini, eggplant, onion, garlic, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Spread the vegetables out on a baking sheet and roast for 25-30 minutes, until they are tender and lightly browned.
In a 9x13 inch baking dish, spread a thin layer of marinara sauce on the bottom.
Top with 3 lasagna noodles, followed by a layer of roasted vegetables, a layer of mozzarella cheese, and a layer of ricotta cheese.
Repeat layers of noodles, vegetables, and cheeses until all ingredients are used up.
Top with a final layer of marinara sauce and sprinkle with parmesan cheese.
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove the foil and bake for another 15

details.title: Ingredients
details.description: This recipe serves 3 and requires the following ingredients: This classic spaghetti and meatballs recipe is a crowd-pleaser. The meatballs are made with ground beef and pork, and are seasoned with garlic and Italian herbs for extra flavor. Serve with a side of garlic bread and a simple salad for a delicious and satisfying meal.
method: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Place flour, eggs, and breadcrumbs mixed with parmesan cheese into separate shallow bowls.
Dredge chicken in flour, shaking off excess, then dip in beaten eggs and coat with breadcrumb mixture.
Place breaded chicken on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper, and bake for 20 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through.
In a small saucepan, heat marinara sauce over medium heat until heated through.
Remove chicken from oven and top each breast with 1/3 cup marinara sauce, 1/2 cup shredded mozzarella cheese, and a sprinkle of chopped basil.
Return to oven and bake for another 10 minutes, until cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve hot with pasta or a side salad.

details.title: Ingredients
details.description: This recipe serves 1 and requires the following ingredients: This comforting beef stew is the perfect cold-weather meal. It's made with tender beef, root vegetables, and a rich broth that's flavored with red wine and herbs. Serve with a side of crusty bread for a satisfying meal.
method: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While spaghetti is cooking, cook bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp.
Add garlic to the skillet and sauté for another minute.
In a small bowl, whisk together egg, parmesan cheese, heavy cream, salt, and pepper.
Drain spaghetti and add it to the skillet with the bacon and garlic. Remove skillet from heat.
Pour the egg mixture over the spaghetti and toss everything together until the pasta is coated in the sauce and the egg is cooked through.
Serve hot, garnished with additional parmesan cheese and black pepper if desired.
